subtitle: karanī sưksā chumchon lumnam thī dairap phonkrathop čhāk kānkō̜sāng khư̄an Pāk Mūn = Culture for development and restoration of communities, the case studies of communities impacted by Pak Mun Dam
title: Rāingān wičhai chabap sombūn rư̄ang watthanatham phư̄a kānphatthanā læ fư̄nfū sētthakit chumchon
other_titles: Culture for development and restoration of communities

notes.value:
Microfiche. Jakarta : Library of Congress Office ; Washington, D.C. : Library of Congress Photoduplication Service, 2008. 4 microfiches. Master microform held by: DLC.

In Thai, with some articles and summary in English.
